name: hattie likes to stack
description:
hattie is a rabbit

hattie likes when hats are stacked

help hattie get all the hats in one stack

controls:

  • Left/Right - move
  • Up - climb
  • Down - burrow (try with hat)
  • z/u - undo
  • number keys (0-9) - level select

when the heart appears, you have solved the puzzle and you can move on to the next one!!

have fun ~

patch notes:

  • 2022-07-10 14:50 -0700: fixed a bug where burrowing out from a down-facing hat does not roll it backwards (burrowing out from a down-facing hat should always roll it backwards)
